114.content:
I slip the ring onto my finger.... nothing happens..
I admire the ring on my finger for a moment, noting the shiny blue gem embroidered onto it, I'd guess by its looks that it probably has quite the value to it...
As I stared at the ring, I noticed that something seemed off... my hand seemed almost reflective.... I took a closer look, and noticed that it wasn't reflecting anything, but was disappearing!
"W-what the hell!" I shouted, backing up against the wall as I watched my hand start to fade away, the ring dropping off of my finger as it completely disappeared, my hand slowly tearing apart into nothingness. I began panicking, my breathing becoming heavier as I watched my arm slowly vanish, desperate tears starting to well up in my face.
"No! Nonono! Please no!" I screamed desperately, not wanting to accept the reality of what was happening. My body was now almost completely consumed by nothingness, my shirt sliding to the ground as my legs followed the same transition, my head in a position to where I would be laying down if my body were still present.

Darkness....

My mind slowly started drifting off, my thoughts almost non-existent, the whole experience feeling like I was taking a nap. My eyes closed, as my head became transparent, taking one last empty breath in, before disappearing....

The doorbell rang. "I'm coming!" James shouted. He paused his game and went to the front door. No one was there, but on the door step was a box. James opened it; inside was a ring. This ring looked like it was brought straight from the days of knights and dragons. He recognized the image craved into the face of the ring. "The Triforce... from Legend of Zelda... Cool!" James slipped the ring onto his finger. He found a note at the bottom of the box. It was a slip of parchment, yes parchement not paper, signed Love, Z

James just shrugged and went back to his Wii, but started to feel weird.

153.content:
Suddenly, I heard a knock on the door. Opening the door, I was surprised to find a guy with a box.

"This is for you."

I was confused. I really wasn't expecting any deliveries today. I guess I should've, what with it being my birthday and all. However, while I was contemplating it, the man left the box on my doorstep. I looked back up again. He was gone.

I took the box inside. With it now sitting on my table, I examined the note on top.

The note said: "Happy Birthday, James! I know you like SEGA games so I got you this. Go ahead! Open the box up!"

I was confused, but also quite interested. What could it be?! Only one way to find out...

So I got out my box cutter and cut the tape on the top of the box.

Opening it, I was astounded at what lay inside: A copy of Space Channel 5, and a microphone! Picking it up, I noticed how authentic it felt. It looked just like Ulala's!

I knew, then and there, what I must do.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------

In my bedroom, SEGA Dreamcast all set up with the custom copy of Space Channel 5 inside it, and microphone plugged in, I was ready to play.

However, as I began to play, I didn't realize that I was beginning to change...

(Pick what you want to change first)
153.title: Ulala

choices: Change your mind and go to bed
15512.content:
It was around 11:30 one night, a Saturday. I had just finished slipping on some badly worn pajamas, and was heading over to bed. I was just about to enter my room, when I heard a familiar jingle coming from my little sisters room as I walked by. I couldn't quite pin down what the sound was from, although I was one-hundred percent sure that I've heard it before.

I went over to my sisters door, making sure to knock (she'd probably go all crazy at me if I didn't,) a familiar, "come in" following in response
15512.title: Does James see Rachel playing Sonic Rush

choices: Ask if you can beat the boss for her
155121.content:
I turn the knob to my sisters room, walking in to find that my sister was playing on her old DS. I heard a pause sound come from her game, before she turned her attention towards me, her head tilted sideways.

"What's up?"

"Oh! Uhm... I heard your game.. It sounded familiar. What exactly are you playing?"

she turned her device over towards me, and to my surprise, I saw a still screen showing what looked to be a boss battle-- it was a strange casino-themed one, with all kinds of flashy lights, on the screen, there was a semi-pixelated purple cat girl jumping in the air, fire underneath her. I knew immediately what the game was.

"Hey! Is that sonic rush!?"

My sister simply nodded her head, her expression a little flustered, which caused me to gain a small amount of concern.

"...What's wrong, sis?"

"I can't beat this damn boss battle, I always die at the last three hits."

As she said those words, I found an opportunity to get to play the title again... and although I ditched the series before, I couldn't help but want to try and play the game a little once more...
155121.title: Enter your sisters room

choices: Grab a late night snack in the kitchen
1551211.content:
"Hey!" I said. "I could beat the boss for you if you'd like! I think I remember the game well enough to do it!

My sister thought about it for a second, before handing her DS out towards me, nodding her head slightly as she did so.

"Take it.. Just make sure you give it back in the morning."

"Sure thing," I said, as I grabbed the handheld from her, exiting the room directly after. I heard some fumbling around from her room, and looked back to see the lights turn off from a crack under the door. It was late, and she probably put herself to sleep. I couldn't even exactly say why I was still up. I looked over at the DS and checked the clock on it.

'12:21pm'

"Huh.. I guess it's getting pretty late.."

Next, I decided to...
1551211.title: Ask if you can beat the boss for her

15512111.content:
I let out a small yawn, and decided to head over to my room, the room itself located across the hall from my sisters room. I walked in and closed the door behind me, hopping onto my bed, getting under the covers before pulling the DS out again. As I pressed a button to resume the boss, a small, split-second flash appeared on the bottom touch screen.

"strange.." I said to myself, thinking of it just as a glitch, nothing more.

I ended up wasting a few lives on the boss, my rage levels exceeding a safe amount at this point. After dying in the game a few more times, I paused it, attempting to calm myself down a bit before resuming on this hard as hell boss battle. I put the DS system onto a desk by my bed, and got up to go to the restroom. I finished doing my business, and went back to my bed, looking down at my undersized clothes, before laying myself back down.

"Ugh... These things are tight as hell... Why am I even trying with them.." I grunted, sliding my tight pajama pants off, followed by my flimsy t-shirt. I looked down at my boxers for a moment, before sliding them down to the floor too, that last bit of clothing not really mattering with everything else off. I snuck my bare body into my covers again, picking up the DS once more. As I neared the un-pause button, I stared at the system in confusion. There was a glowing white icon on the lower screen, with the only thing showing being a red gem of some sort. I looked at it quizzically for a moment, thinking of what I should do next.

What will you do?
15512111.title: Go over to your bedroom

155122.content:
While the tune was on my mind, I was still a little too tired to investigate.

I took my hand off of the doorknob, and went into my bedroom, shutting the light off behind me, before closing my own door shut. As I drifted of to sleep, I couldn't help but wonder what that tune was, and what sort of an outcome could've happened, if I had opened that door....
155122.title: Change your mind and go to bed

15533222222222222222222.content: How about the female characters from Overwatch?
15533222222222222222222.title: Overwatch

155332222222222222222221.content: Recently, I enjoy playing Overwatch! I don't know why I play a multiplayer focus game with no single campaign, but it is really addicting. The environments are splendid, the game play is clean, and the characters were colorful. However, I play with the female characters more than that of the male because they have more charisma, they're hot (most of them), and they are very skilled whether use their brawns, skills, or brains. I always dreamed of becoming one of them, and thanks to the this device I have in my hands, I can become one of these girls. The question is, which female character should I be?
155332222222222222222221.title: Overwatch Time!

1553322222222222222222211.content: After much thought, I decided on being the all time favorite character within Overwatch. Tracer. She is one of the best girls out there as she has the energy, bubbly personality, and the mean streak on her. Her skills is moving at quick speeds with the help of the Chronal Accelerator to not only let her zip across the battlefield, but also recall herself to get her health back. Her weapons comprises of duel short range pistols for rapid fire and her pulse bomb that would stick a target to blow them up at a wide radius. She is one of the best characters in the Overwatch universe and would be the perfect choice for me. Now how to I transform into Tracer? What is the speed of the transformation?
1553322222222222222222211.title: Becoming Tracer

1553322222222222222222212.content: What about Windowmaker, the cold and decisive sniper?
1553322222222222222222212.title: Widowmaker

15533222222222222222222121.content: After much thought, I decided on being one of the most skillful of characters within Overwatch. Widowmaker. Tactic wise, she has quite a skill and is one of the best snipers in the game. Acting like a spider, she dangles on buildings and edges in order to get her kill, including in the air. With her trusty rifle, she can use it as a machine gun to take out opponents in short range and as a sniper to shoot at long distances. She has a grappling hook to latch onto the highest of buildings to get a good shot. Her venom mine, when placed, can weaken her opponents when it's detonated. And her Infra-Sight lets her see her enemy's heating signiture on a wide basis. She is Overwatch's most resourceful character and would be the perfect choice for me. Now how to I transform into Widowmaker? What is the speed of the transformation?
15533222222222222222222121.title: Becoming Widowmaker

15533222222222222222222122.content: What about Sombra, the Latina hacker and manipulator?
15533222222222222222222122.title: Sombra

155332222222222222222221221.content:
Jack thought this through and decided to go for Sombra. Ever since playing the game, he always have the hots for the the Latina hacker. Her skills of stealth, teleportation, and hacking make her a reliable character in a multiplayer base game. Doesn't matter if it's the sup machine gun that kills players, or the hack or EMP that weakens the player, or the fact that Sombra could hack health kits or teleportation for safety, or even vanishing for a sneak attack, she is very resourceful. And if he was honest, Jack always has the hots for Latin girls.

At a boy his age, he finds Latin girls to be very sexy. Maybe it's the way they speak, maybe it's the way they move, or how they behave. Regardless, this is Jack's chance in transforming himself into a Latin babe to know how it feels like. And with an Overwatch character like her, it's the perfect opportunity. So without a second thought, he went on ahead and choose Sombra to be turned into. Entering the name, he has a choice of whether the changes would be gradual or immediate. Which one would he choose?
155332222222222222222221221.title: Hack the Planet

155332222222222222222221222.content: Maybe I should be Pharah, the noble flyer with the determination in protecting her home.
155332222222222222222221222.title: No

1553322222222222222222212221.content:
Thinking of these many female characters, I decided to go with Pharah. Real name Fareeha Amari, honor and duty runs in her veins. She is part of the Helix Security International, a private security firm contracted to defend the artificial intelligence research facility beneath the Giza Plateau, and sworn to protect both her country and her people. She is equipped with the Raptora Mark VI, an experimental combat suit designed for rapid mobility and devastating firepower. Those said features include a rocket launcher, jet boosters, concussive blast, and mini missiles on her shoulders for a barrage. She is one of the most brave, loyal, and honorable female characters to date.

I always want to be that character, to be Pharah. I always wish to fly in the air, to shoot those rockets, and fire those barrages. And now with this device, I can get that wish. So without hesitation, I started to click on Pharah's name and started the change. But how will the change happen?
1553322222222222222222212221.title: Justice Rains from Above

1553322222222222222222212222.content: Then Pharrah's mother, Anna, a devoted sniper and healer with a kind heart and experience.

155332222222222222222221222222.title: D.va

1553322222222222222222212222221.content:
Thinking of what to do, I decided to choose the most popular and famous character with in the Overwatch community, D.Va. Real name Hana Song, she is a hardcore gamer who is a part of the Mobile Exo-Force, a military facility in South Korea and pilots her Meka mech by the name of Tokki. She is a tank with a variety of weapons including fusion cannons, defense matrix, boosters, micro missiles, and a self-destruct sequence. Even with her mech destroyed, she can still fight with her light gun and while not effective with stronger characters, help quicken the cool down as she can call back her mech.

I always wondered what it would be like as D.Va. She is young, spunky, and is the best fighter in the game. Another reason I wanted to become her is because I have a hard on for Asian chicks. I'm pretty much a Weibo with a collection of anime girl figurines and mech models and while D.Va isn't from Japan, she does look hot in that tight Evangelion like suit. I really want to see what it would feel like to be her, filling out the curves of the latex and fitting into a bulky mech. So with that in my head, I type down the information of D.Va and entered it into the device. Once I'm done, there was an option to make the changes gradual or immediate. What should I choose?
1553322222222222222222212222221.title: I Play to Win

155332222222222222222222.content: Uncharted, perhaps? Something at least. This is getting absurd.
155332222222222222222222.title: No...  Let's find something else.

15533222222222222222222211.content: James remembered playing the Uncharted games. Their story, graphics and action were all top notch. Yet, his favorite character of the entire franchise was Elena Fisher, journalist extraordinaire. Grabbing the stone that would allow him to become her, if only for a while, on the table, he spoke her name aloud, and was greeted by a white flash of light, searing his eyes in the process. When he opened his eyes, he was greeted by the spitting image of Elena Fisher. Though sizably shorter than before "Her" blonde hair went down to his mid back. Her decent bust was tightly constrained in her small shirt, and her ass was pressed tightly against her skinny jeans. He WAS Elena Fisher. He then had to decide whether to just stay inside, or go out.
15533222222222222222222211.title: Elena

155332222222222222222222111.content: After considering it, "she" decided against going out. It was looking rather nasty out, with rain lashing the sides of the house. Of course, it was nice and warm within the house, and the motivation to do anything except get some food, curl up, and play video games was non existent. Because she lacked originality, she decided to play through the Uncharted series. Before sitting down to play, she grabbed two bags of chips, 1 two liter of soda, one pizza, and a bag of popcorn, having to make several trips to kitchen to do so. After hours of lazing about her apartment, getting sucked into the story as it unfolded, she noticed that she finished roughly three fourths of what she had set out. "Wow, I guess I was hungry." she thought to herself. Not wanting any leftovers, she finished the rest of her meal quickly. After she had cleaned up her mess. she decided to continue to laze about, and survey the damage done to her shape. Nothing seemed too out of the ordinary. Her clothes felt slightly tighter, and were covered in food stains. Her biggest notice, however, was her belly. It was pushed out like a ball of dough, yet when she put pressure on it, she let out an audible gasp of pain. However, this feeling of getting fatter gave her some odd sense of... pleasure? However, before she could reflect more on that sentiment, her food coma took over and she passed out.
155332222222222222222222111.title: Stay in and eat

1553322222222222222222221112.content: A week later, and things had not transpired quite the way James originally planned them to. After a week... he was till Elena Fisher.His friend had said a day, but for some reason here he was, still a body double of the journalist extraordinaire. "Body double," however, would imply that James was still a skinny little blonde. This was not the case. A week of frantic searching for a cure had taken a toll on his body. Her boobs had swelled noticeably, meaning that her bra was discarded long ago. Down lower, her belly had developed into a thick beer gut, hanging down slightly when she didn't want to suck it in. "God, I can't keep my shirt down! I need to shopping, before I get anymore pig like." Her thighs had spread, definite touching near her sensitive areas, and her ass had expanded to the point where she had torn holes in her jeans with bits of her flesh screaming to get out. No doubt about it, she was chubby. Perhaps her most embarrassing moment was when a young woman grabbed some of her ass when she was bent over, searching for jeans a few sizes bigger.She had let out some gas from her rear, making her cheeks, both sets of them, quite red. "I see someone likes that. Call this number if you want a fun time, little piggy." With that, the young woman slipped a piece of paper into "Elena's" front pocket, jigging her stomach as she did so. After quickly turning around, he saw a darker skinned, fit young woman briskly walking away. Tearfully buying the clothes and (trying) to run to her apartment, Elena let out a small cry, as well as the rest of the gas from her ass. She hated how much of a fat little piggy she was, but the same voice kept telling her to keep doing what she was doing. She was toying with the idea of calling the woman at the atore, but also wanted to see what she really looked like now, no hands barred.
1553322222222222222222221112.title: A week later...

155332222222222222222222112.content: It was a fine day, so I decided to go out. Thankfully, my clothes were still decent, so I was able to just go out and start walking. I decided to just walk into the nearby park and perhaps go to a few stores in town. Of course, I caught a fair few stares from men and women alike, but I didn't really care until I reached the edge of town. Of course, when I tried to open the door to the nearest clothing boutique, I felt myself getting smaller...
155332222222222222222222112.title: Go outside
